name: Image Quality/Rec
description: Access to image quality and recording settings

settings.name: File Format
settings.description: Sets the file format for still images. RAW for professional editing, RAW+J/H for both editing and immediate use, or JPEG/HEIF for compatibility

settings.name: RAW File Type
settings.description: Sets the file type for RAW images. Uncompressed offers highest quality, Lossless compression preserves quality with smaller size, Compressed reduces file size further

settings.name: JPEG/HEIF Switch
settings.description: Selects between JPEG (wider compatibility) or HEIF (smaller file size with better quality). HEIF(4:2:2) offers improved color sampling

settings.name: Image Quality Settings
settings.description: Access to quality settings for JPEG/HEIF images

settings.name: JPEG Quality
settings.description: Sets the image quality for JPEG images. Higher quality means larger file size

settings.name: HEIF Quality
settings.description: Sets the image quality for HEIF images. Higher quality means larger file size

settings.name: JPEG Image Size
settings.description: Sets the size of JPEG images. L uses full resolution (60MP)

settings.name: HEIF Image Size
settings.description: Sets the size of HEIF images. L uses full resolution (60MP)

settings.name: Aspect Ratio
settings.description: Sets the aspect ratio of still images

settings.name: HLG Still Image
settings.description: Enables HDR still image capture using Hybrid Log-Gamma (HLG) with wide dynamic range and BT.2020 color gamut

settings.name: Color Space
settings.description: Sets the color reproduction range. sRGB is standard for general use, AdobeRGB offers wider color range for professional editing

settings.name: Long Exposure NR
settings.description: Sets noise reduction processing for shots with a 1-second or longer exposure

settings.name: High ISO NR
settings.description: Sets the noise reduction processing level for high-sensitivity shooting

settings.name: Apply Custom Setting
settings.description: Sets whether to apply the same custom white balance, creative look, and other settings to both still images and movies
